verses.name: Genesis 21:1
verses.text: And the Lord visited Sarah as he had said, and the Lord did unto Sarah as he had spoken.

verses.name: Genesis 21:2
verses.text: For Sarah conceived, and bare Abraham a son in his old age, at the set time of which God had spoken to him.

verses.name: Genesis 21:3
verses.text: And Abraham called the name of his son that was born unto him, whom Sarah bare to him, Isaac.

verses.name: Genesis 21:4
verses.text: And Abraham circumcised his son Isaac being eight days old, as God had commanded him.

verses.name: Genesis 21:5
verses.text: And Abraham was an hundred years old, when his son Isaac was born unto him.
